body: Like they said he was heavily influenced by his scumbag dad.. Nothing much he could really do

I have no sympathy for Sadaharu. The "shitbag dad" excuse only goes so far. He could've easily told her after the first time that that was it and she didn't need to fuck him again after that, but he didn't. While he did earn back a few brownie points for finally coming to his senses in the middle of that stupid ass tantrum and letting her go, it doesn't excuse him flat-out abusing his power by drugging her to force her to have an orgasm or telling her to go rape Masato knowing full well that she'd do whatever he commanded, so she doesn't owe him a damn thing.
He was in love but he didnt knew how to express it.
@KaynemPro ofc there is, these just ch. 1 - 3
do you guys know if this is really the end or still has a conti uation. I wanna see if at least there is a good ending for this guy
This is the first time I felt sympathy for the guy in a hentai.
Fell bad for the guy. I don't think he was inherently a bad person. I think he was strongly influenced by his evil dad.  In the end though he couldn't bare being hated by her.
For petes sakes ,the end was like........i feel bad for him :/
